casebody.data:
John C. MIDDLETON, petitioner,
v.
Don ROPER, Warden. No. 14-5248 14A56. Supreme Court of the United States July 16, 2014.

Opinion *16Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
